name: The Trees O'Wisdom
description:
The Trees O'Wisdom

You are a young little fox who hates math and becomes very frustrated with the fact that you have to study math and work on math problems almost everyday, at school, at home.

One day, after waking up, you find yourself alone on an isolated island. The sky is swamped with scary, aggressive eagles. In your panic, you hear strange voices from the trees surrounding you. They are calling out to you, saying, "show us your wisdom, and we shall grant you protection."
